summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackINKEY Glycolic Acid Exfoliating Toner is a 10 percent glycolic acid exfoliating toner that helps to reduce the appearance of pores and fine lines for smoother, brighter skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsDerived from sugar cane, this Glycolic Acid Toner works to unglue dead skin on the surface to help improve the overall look of skin texture and brightness. Itâ€™s formulated with 10 percent glycolic acid for maximum effect and five percent witch hazel to help control oil.Key IngredientsGlycolic Acid 10%: Provides a deep exfoliation of dead skin cells. Witch Hazel 5%: Helps to control excess oil.Item 2641803How To UseSuggested Usage:-Use in the PM.-Saturate a cotton pad with the formula and on cleansed skin, sweeping across the face and neck.-Do not rinse off.-Follow with serums and moisturizers.-Start with one application every other night and increase to once daily if desired.Precautions:-AHAs can increase sun sensitivity due to their exfoliating properties. Prior to sun exposure, cover areas where the product has been applied with sunscreen and for seven days after use.-Do not use if you have rosacea.-Avoid direct contact with eyes and lips.-If irritation occurs, discontinue use and consult a doctor.-You may feel a slight tingling or hot sensation on the skin when applying. However, If there is any itching or a prolonged burning sensation discontinue use immediately.-External use only.IngredientsWater, Glycolic Acid, Propanediol, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Butylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Alcohol, PPG-26-Buteth-26, Betaine, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Boerhavia Diffusa Root Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Use in the PM.-Saturate a cotton pad with the formula and on cleansed skin, sweeping across the face and neck.-Do not rinse off.-Follow with serums and moisturizers.-Start with one application every other night and increase to once daily if desired.Precautions:-AHAs can increase sun sensitivity due to their exfoliating properties. Prior to sun exposure, cover areas where the product has been applied with sunscreen and for seven days after use.-Do not use if you have rosacea.-Avoid direct contact with eyes and lips.-If irritation occurs, discontinue use and consult a doctor.-You may feel a slight tingling or hot sensation on the skin when applying. However, If there is any itching or a prolonged burning sensation discontinue use immediately.-External use only.

faceoff_positive.comments: At the outset, I had a few concerns as there were a couple of instances where the toner caused slight tingling, despite a successful patch test. However, I'm pleased to share that my skin has since adapted well to it, and I now genuinely enjoy using this toner. It's remarkable how my skin has acclimated over time, allowing me to incorporate it seamlessly into my routine. The initial hesitation was definitely worth it, and I'm now reaping the benefits of this toner. It's become a staple I look forward to using regularly!
faceoff_positive.headline: Overcoming Initial Hesitations - A Toner Worth the Wait

faceoff_negative.comments: Worst product I have used possibly ever. I have decided to use it on my combination skin thinking that since I have no reaction to actives like retinol this would be fine. My face was instantly on fire. Especially my oily T-zone. My forehead and upper lip area were bright red and swollen. Took all night of trying everything I had to stop the burning.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not for sensitive skin
